item.description: Joe Heller cartoon on deer hunting with drones.

item.title: How D.C. will remember Mayor Bowser
item.description: The Democrat put the capital city before her own political ambitions.

item.title: How Thanksgiving shrank down to the size of a screen
item.description: Pretty soon, what once was an epic four-day holiday weekend could turn into a Zoom event.

item.title: I led U.S. actions against drug shipments. Laws remained intact.

item.description: Dana Summers cartoon on health care costs.

item.title: A ‘great unmasking’ on X is arming Americans with digital borders
item.description: The social media platform’s move to show users’ location is a great step toward online transparency.

item.title: Taiwan’s president: I will boost defense spending to protect our democracy
item.description: An unprecedented military buildup by China threatens peace and stability in the region.

item.title: Zelensky has clearly read ‘The Art of the Deal’
item.description: If Ukraine gets security assurances and Russia balks, Trump needs to punish Putin.

item.title: The arsenal of democracy cannot fight like this
item.description: The U.S. military’s defense acquisition system is a casualty of bureaucracy.

item.title: America has become a rogue nation. U.S. allies are looking elsewhere.
item.description: Europeans and Canadians are talking about making their own security arrangements.

item.title: This ‘sleepy’ Supreme Court case could change Americans’ lives
item.description: The case involving Chevron and Louisiana is an attempt to reshape national policy through state courts.

item.title: The scourge of automatic hand dryers
item.description: Holiday travelers deserve better than inadequate and unsanitary dryers.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene to resign
item.description: Michael Ramirez cartoon on the representative’s resignation.

item.title: Trump’s lawfare campaign hits its first snag
item.description: It might seem like Comey and James got off on a technicality, but ensuring prosecutors are lawfully appointed is essential.

item.title: Let members of Congress trade stocks. With one big condition.

item.title: Japan’s approach to aging, debt-ridden decline is no model for the U.S.
item.description: America urgently needs entitlement reform and economic growth, not Japanese-style debt risk.

item.title: An innovative approach to expanding health coverage is gaining steam
item.description: A portable benefits program is the solution that meets the moment.

item.title: Attempts to demonize the Taj Mahal damage more than history
item.description: The storied monument has become a flash point in India’s Hindu-Muslim conflict.
